education.title: N. L. Dalmia Institute of Management Studies and Research

recommendations: Rahull Mishraa ‚ÄúPratik has been an amazing mentor and a highly motivated professional. I happen to approach Pratik in my quest for finding an appropriate platform to understand the intricacies of Investment Banking. I enrolled for his Investment Banking course (though not for all the modules as I have prior experience in Financial Modelling being an Equity Research Associate for past 6 years) and without a doubt, the course content and pedagogy was beyond my expectation. Pratik brings his vast knowldege and industry experience into his teaching and ensures that his students actively participate in the learning process. He was instrumental in polishing my financial modelling skills through some unique tricks and trips which are coming handy in my current job as well. Pratik made complex concepts of LBO and M&A easy to understand with logical case studies. Without an iota of doubt, I would highly recommend Pratik to anyone looking out for a right platform to understand and learn the nuances of Investment Banking.‚Äù

Prasad Sahasrabudhe ‚ÄúHad gone through the training of Investment Banking under Pratik Sir and got to learn lot of new things regarding valuation, Advance Valuation.I will strongly recommend taking guidance of Pratik Sir to anyone who wants to gain knowledge in this field.‚Äù
